Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: You can ask AI anytime you want. You can ask AI any question that you need to know.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: When AI give you a feedback normally it give you with the example and explain how to make it better but teacher doesn't. So, sometime feedback from teacher make me overwhelmed and frustrated because I don't know what to do to make them satisfy.
